title: Default kernel weights initialization of convolution layer
body_html:
Default kernel weights initialization of convolution layer. I use the function conv2d, but I can't find the initial weights of the convolution kernel , or how initialize the weights of convolution kernels?

Can you give me some suggestions ?
Thank you so much.
